website_summaries.verdict: Trolli appeals to fans of berry-flavored candies with this selection of worms.
pros: The tart worms are sour on the outside, then sweet underneath
These are individually packed as 6 bags, convenient for travel and portion control
cons: Some say these worms taste different from the ones sold in stores

customer_reviews.title: They smell and taste amazing!
customer_reviews.text: So happy to have found these! I have an autistic son who gets rewarded for using the potty as we have issues with regression once in awhile, but he loves the red/blue trolli worms, and will eat the red/yellow, but hates green/orange. When I saw they offered berry I knew it was going to be a hit! Now I am not throwing away a 1/3 of the bag! He's very happy with his treats and is staying consistent!
customer_reviews.author: VSand

customer_reviews.title: Buy them! Just don’t but them all 😍
customer_reviews.text: I love these very berry Trolli’s! I bought 2 bags and currently have 2 more in my cart ready for check out. They are so addicting and I love snacking on them while I craft. I was getting them at menards and then halloween exploded and they disappeared. These are so fresh! I bought them several times at menards and only once were they soft and fresh. These taste like they should! Fresh, full of flavor a whole lot of em’ 🥰 One bag last me about a week 😬
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: Very Berry 5 Lb Bag For Sure
customer_reviews.text: Just as the product suggests, it's a 5 Lb Candy Bag of Trolli Sour Brite Crawlers Very Berry Gummy Worms, or, it sure taste like it. -Flavor: 5/5; Tastes exactly the same as you would expect to buy as the version in the supermarket. -Presentation: 3/5; This bag is NOT resealable nor does it have any indication of authenticity. Amazon Warehouse simply filled a 5 Lb cereal bag, sealed it, labeled it from the warehouse with an expiration date, and shipped it. At least it was clear and I could see inside. -Value for Money: 5/5; Got this 5 Lb baby for $7.95...compared to prices that I can find in my local supermarket, I would've paid $40!
customer_reviews.author: Kyle

customer_reviews.title: Great to give as rewards
customer_reviews.text: I'm a teacher and each week I go out and get candy to reward my students with. I got to the point that I just need an efficient way to get my candy, because sometimes I forget to go out and buy more. These lasted me 10 school days with 40 students. My students loved the flavors and I'll continue buying these for the school year to come.
customer_reviews.author: OP

customer_reviews.title: Great snack candy for those that like sweet/sour chews.
customer_reviews.text: I only gave it 4 stars because it came in a bag that is non-resealable. I had to put it into another sealable container/bag. That being said, I love putting a few of these candies in a snack bag and having them in my lunch bag for a later snack at work. I am diabetic & have had bariatric surgery. A small serving of this candy does not adversely affect my blood sugar and fulfills my occasional craving for something sweet, as well as fills me up! I recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Christine S.

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: I honestly wasn't expecting there to be so many in the bag they came in but you do get a ton for a good price and although I have a little bit of shame after buying these I love these gummies, I just wish the bag came with a seal so you could just open it and close it.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for a gift!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my girlfriend and she loved them! She was craving gummy worms during quarantine and was weary of going to the store for them so I ordered these and they were exactly what she needed! I would definitely recommend. It came in the branded packaging as shown in the pictures advertised and were very high quality (and not stuck together, which was a concern). 10/10
customer_reviews.author: Cameron Butts

customer_reviews.title: Okay-ish
customer_reviews.text: I remember Trolli Gummy Worms having a bite to them. These were softer and that's kind of offputting to me. I guess I can just leave the bag open for a while. I was really disappointed the blue/red worm didn't taste like the original ones did. These are okay, imo, not as good as I expected. I gave the rest of the bags away like it was Halloween.
customer_reviews.author: Shirley

customer_reviews.title: Very Berry Flavor - 5lbs goes fast!
customer_reviews.text: Huge hit, these were amazing and gone within a few days. The texture was spot on, not too hard and not too soft... just right. I would buy again, completely satisfied with my purchase. Shipping and packaging were nicely done, got here within two days as promised for Prime shipping.
customer_reviews.author: S

customer_reviews.title: They are yummy but ...
customer_reviews.text: I feel like you don't get as much in this bag as you get in the regular sour worms. A good portion of the bag is air so don't expect a ton like with the other worms. They're still really good. My family gobbled them up.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly M. Clayborne

customer_reviews.title: Way too good. Very flavorful
customer_reviews.text: Too good. If I buy the 5lb bulk bag I will eat the whole thing within a week or so. I can eat this stuff so fast. I am sure that's not healthy so I cant have this in my house. No self control on my behalf. Not the candys fault.
customer_reviews.author: Malisa

customer_reviews.title: Legit Trolli
customer_reviews.text: Just got these and they are perfect. I saw the feedback about them being knockoffs, but these are legit Trolli. Great taste and value. Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: Maggie C

customer_reviews.title: No sour taste what so ever...
customer_reviews.text: Don't know if they're old or what not, but I've bought bags from the store that taste 1000% better. They're almost wet looking and have no sour taste to them what so ever... I don't see myself ever purchasing these online again, sad too because the value is insane if you enjoy them. Also, bag looks nothing like the picture on the product page. Just a big clear bag with one small label on it with a barcode.
customer_reviews.author: Bryan

customer_reviews.title: Terrible Taste
customer_reviews.text: I really enjoyed the Trolli gummy sour bite pack (blue bag), so I figured these berry ones would be delicious too! Unfortunately, they lack that sour zing. The lack of sour leaves room for the berry flavor to be very overpowering in both smell and taste. Opening the bag, I was overwhelmed by this faux berry smell and the taste did not prove to be much better. I am mostly disappointed because these are soft, chewy, and everything you want in a gummy but the flavor is just too disgusting to consume. I recommend trolli gummy, but not these!
customer_reviews.author: J K M

customer_reviews.title: Surprisingly fresh
customer_reviews.text: These arrived today and I couldn't wait to try them. I was concerned they might be stale but I trust Amazon to correct any issues. They are fresh and very yummy. The bag isn't resealable so I transferred them to 4 sandwich bags and squeezed out the air.
customer_reviews.author: HS Mom

customer_reviews.title: LOVE THESE!
customer_reviews.text: This particular flavor is the BEST and maybe the hardest to come by where I was living at the time. Buying them in bulk was a GREAT decision! I ate them for about a week and had no regrets at all. Also, given that this size would cost about $4 anywhere else, I got them for a great bargain!
customer_reviews.author: Te'Erica Eason

customer_reviews.title: Mine arrived stale this time :(
customer_reviews.text: I love these, and have purchased this listing 3 times (at time of this review). The only reason I'm leaving few stars is to let others know the packaging, although usually great, is not without it's defects and my third/last order arrived stale tasting and hard. I didn't understand why until I noticed a few small holes in the packaging (which allowed air in I'm guessing) and these are not allowed for return/replacement. However otherwise with the value, is great, and so is the flavor but was saddened by the hard to chew candies this time.
customer_reviews.author: kal tyre

customer_reviews.title: Ate enough to hurt my mouth
customer_reviews.text: I'm a big fan of sour candy (Any candy really), and I ended up finishing several bags of this stuff in a single session. I ended up hurting my mouth, but 10/10 would do again.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph Nguyen

customer_reviews.title: Delicious, fresh, worth every penny!
customer_reviews.text: Ordered and received in less than 24 hours. First thing I checked was the date! Date stamped for December 2021, which means it is very fresh. Candy is delicious and exactly what I wanted! Bag is not resealable, but I separate bag into several ziploc bags. It helps keep them fresh. If your reading this review, it’s because you like this candy as much as I do. Order this, and you’ll never buy small bags in the grocery store ever again!
customer_reviews.author: Momof3gr8kids

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: Super happy with my purchase, already ordering another bag. It's my current pregnancy craving and saving a bunch getting in bulk. The only thing I wish is it came in a resealable bag.
customer_reviews.author: Jessie

customer_reviews.title: Delicious!
customer_reviews.text: Yum, yum, yum! Definitely a must-have as a candy! The different flavor combinations made this product unique and delicious, and it was hard to get bored of it!
customer_reviews.author: Domika0717

customer_reviews.title: Opened container
customer_reviews.text: I’m sure the flavor is fine but came shopped in a cardboard box opened and with no indicator of the brand of candy. Not acceptable at all. It looked like someone just ate some of the candy and stuck it in a box.
customer_reviews.author: Victoria

customer_reviews.title: Very tasty!
customer_reviews.text: My sister and I split them and the money, these are very tasty and addicting to eat. My sister ate her half in a few days and I ate mine in a couple weeks... we both tried to save them. Highly recommend, very good
customer_reviews.author: Mandy2020

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: Got a bulk bag to put in my boydriends Christmas stocking, they're good and soft but the expiration date is only 2 months out from when we got them and that's a LOT of gummies to eat in two months.
customer_reviews.author: Carly

customer_reviews.title: great for office candy dish
customer_reviews.text: got these to put at my desk at the office for coworkers. they're the perfect mini size and tasted great. coworkers have all commented how much they like these gummi worms.
customer_reviews.author: vcw

customer_reviews.title: A little stale
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately they tasted a little hard and stale. I eat trolli all the time and know their gummy worms to be much chewier
customer_reviews.author: Kelly Michael

customer_reviews.title: These taste so FRESH. SUPER DELICIOUS
customer_reviews.text: If you love the very berry troll gummies you will love these. They are extremely fresh soft and delicious. You get a lot with your order. They last a long time I just kept them in a sealed baggie. These are very good and way fresher than the stores sell them.
customer_reviews.author: Snowgirl

customer_reviews.title: unfortunately stale
customer_reviews.text: I bought a pack of these at safeway on a whim, and they were delicious - soft and flavorful. Ordered here, and unfortunately the worms were though and with not as much flavor.
customer_reviews.author: anya

customer_reviews.title: It's a lot of gummies...
customer_reviews.text: I seriously underestimated how much 5lbs really is. I usually just eat straight from the bag while playing games - bad call with this bag. I would 100% recommend portioning so you don't mindlessly eat 2lbs of gummies and make your fiancé mad that you're no longer hungry for dinner...or breakfast the next morning.
customer_reviews.author: Jordan Rafferty

customer_reviews.title: Mmmmmmm
customer_reviews.text: Yum! Love these! Much softer than product sold in stores but I feel like they aren’t as sour??? Still yummy.
customer_reviews.author: B Irish

customer_reviews.title: YUMMY!  SO FRESH!
customer_reviews.text: I was REALLY surprised at how big the package was! And, with Trolli, you know you can't go wrong!
customer_reviews.author: Ekko

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t receive all of them
customer_reviews.text: I ordered a 5oz package of 12 and I only received 1 for some odd reason. I mean I like jokes but this $11 one ain’t funny
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Delicious!
customer_reviews.text: What can go wrong with candy? These are sour then sweet good! I prefer more sour but, I cant seem to find pure sour candy. Id stil recommend these 😁
customer_reviews.author: Shelly W

customer_reviews.title: gummy worms
customer_reviews.text: I prefer other flavors. But there are what was available. They were fresh and arrived in advertisised condition
customer_reviews.author: Judge

customer_reviews.title: Love these! Great flavors!
customer_reviews.text: I loooove these! I always find only the small bag & this was definitely the best value! More bang for your buck!
customer_reviews.author: Krystal

customer_reviews.title: Call your dentist!
customer_reviews.text: This is gross. It’sa HUGE bag sour gummies. It was a present for my son and he was psyched. They arrived fresh and quickly.
customer_reviews.author: T. Marie

customer_reviews.title: How could you NOT give these an awesome review?!
customer_reviews.text: I can never get enough of these gummy worms!! They’re absolutely delicious and came packaged so well. I received these as a gift (lol as if that’s not an indication of my addiction to these) and it was the best gift ever!!! Lasted me quite a while— however I reluctantly shared since I could not imagine eating every bite of these! 😂😂 I recommend repackaging these in Tupperware to make them last longer or plastic baggies.
customer_reviews.author: Tatianna Mounie

customer_reviews.title: Good but roughly chewy
customer_reviews.text: They taste good, but they are way chewier than the original sour brites. Maybe it was just my batch, who knows.
customer_reviews.author: Elijah

customer_reviews.title: Great value and taste
customer_reviews.text: We love these and will be ordering more! They don't last long in our house.
customer_reviews.author: ThatOneGuy

customer_reviews.title: A huge blobby mess
customer_reviews.text: It showed up in a huge melted blob, i was very disappointed bc it made it EXTREMELY hard to deal with, i had to cut the bad open to pry the blob from the plastic, i then had to put it in another Tupperware in order to then have to cut it with a knife to eat.. i was very disappointed but i have gotten a normal bag before so i don’t know if it was a delivery issue..
customer_reviews.author: Andrew

customer_reviews.title: Berry worms
customer_reviews.text: I love this worms! And they are my favorite flavor the berry!!!
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Gumlaw

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it
customer_reviews.text: Ordered the 5lb bag. Thought product would match the description picture but did not have the logo or anything, just the best by date, which was a long time ago and now are tasteless/hard. Cannot tell if these are real trolli or a knock off brand so spending money on this was disappointing. Nothing good came from ordering these
customer_reviews.author: dk

customer_reviews.title: All Berry
customer_reviews.text: It's like the All Berry version of Trolly. :P. I will be reordering again and again.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Brady

customer_reviews.title: Yum!
customer_reviews.text: I freaking love these things. Great flavor. I much prefer this flavor over the rainbow packs of these.
customer_reviews.author: JaneDoe966Top Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: So good
customer_reviews.text: My kids love this flavor. All kinds of berry taste!
customer_reviews.author: Amanda lilly

customer_reviews.title: It’s a huge bag!
customer_reviews.text: What a buy! Big bag of my favorite sour gummies and delivered to your door thank you Amazon!
customer_reviews.author: Barbara

customer_reviews.title: Yummy
customer_reviews.text: Yummy yummy! Everyone's favorite flavor for a good price. Bought these for my girlfriend and she loved them.
customer_reviews.author: ThunderFan

customer_reviews.title: These disappeared... so fast..
customer_reviews.text: Possibly the greatest candy ever made. I used to get these bags individually from Walgreens until I bought the bulk version. Going through a box of 8 in a few weeks has killed my midnight cravings for this lovely gummy candy. FYI the texture is a bit softer than the convenience store version, which was generally more chewy.
customer_reviews.author: Winnie

customer_reviews.title: So Yummi!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Super fresh, First time ordering 5 pounds of gummys at once. I was not disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: BW Person

customer_reviews.title: Yeee Hawww
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love these hard to find gummies. Very fresh and good price
customer_reviews.author: kathy

customer_reviews.title: Got these for my husband for Christmas
customer_reviews.text: He'll likely die from the pure sugar intake, but it will be worth it!
customer_reviews.author: Lana Hokanson

customer_reviews.title: Full size worms, not minis
customer_reviews.text: There were 6 9-ounce bags in the package, but they were the full-size worms, not the minis as advertised in the picture. I wanted the minus because I can’t seem to find them in-store around me. I would have ordered the more economical 5lb bag if I had wanted the full-size.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Worth it!
customer_reviews.text: Worth every penny for the price in stores. Store them in an air tight candy jar for the best flavor and texture.
customer_reviews.author: Christi Boscola

customer_reviews.title: Heaven!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely the best of the crawlers in a 5lb bag of heaven! 😍 Can't get this kinda deal anywhere else I've found.
customer_reviews.author: Brandy L. Kastl

customer_reviews.title: Fresh & half the price of my local grocery store
customer_reviews.text: I love this product so much I reordered it this month! Fresh and great price. Half what I would pay at my local grocery store.
customer_reviews.author: Chey

customer_reviews.title: So worth it
customer_reviews.text: Literally this is lasting us months so worth the money
customer_reviews.author: Lindsey Mulder

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny
customer_reviews.text: Legit Trolli gumies!This is my second order in a week!
customer_reviews.author: WGJ

customer_reviews.title: Taste just like trolli gummy worms!
customer_reviews.text: Definitely like others say not the real deal but still great candy! None of mine came clumped together. Came very fresh and taste close enough that no one would complain!
customer_reviews.author: C.C

customer_reviews.title: Fresh and a good value
customer_reviews.text: My husband loves these but he ate this large bag in record time. Unfortunately I can’t buy these again or he will become a diabetic. Just have to stick to a couple small bags every so often. He just doesn’t know when to quit. Lol
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: Good quality sour crawlers
customer_reviews.text: I was afraid they would come melted together but they didn't. I found a gummy bear in my bag. For me that's a bonus.
customer_reviews.author: Alfredo

customer_reviews.title: Tasty and numerous
customer_reviews.text: While tasty and just what I wanted, you would think such a big bag would be resealable, but it wasn't.
customer_reviews.author: Cole S

customer_reviews.title: Just as listed
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what listing states. Taste great, huge size, just what I ordered
customer_reviews.author: Canoe Tribal HQ

customer_reviews.title: Great value size
customer_reviews.text: I’ve ordered this value package several times...this particular batch was great - good flavor, not too chewy.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very tasty
customer_reviews.text: These are much better asking than the sour bright ones. These are sour but not bitter with a good flavor.
customer_reviews.author: E S K

customer_reviews.title: Great price and arrived very fresh
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my boyfriend who claims he "doesn't like them", yet eats them all up on me whenever they are around. Arrived sealed and fresh. Transferred them to an airtight container immediately after opening and they are still soft and chewy.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Really good
customer_reviews.text: I love gummies and these were perfect for my candy table !
customer_reviews.author: Alberto

customer_reviews.title: They shmack
customer_reviews.text: Only good gummy worms and flavor are these. They're the real deal too and not some knock off brand😭 😭❤️
customer_reviews.author: Uglythony

customer_reviews.title: Okay
customer_reviews.text: Amazed by this, but was expecting all blue and pink colors only, it has a small mixture of red and other colors. But over good
customer_reviews.author: Alejandra Victoria

customer_reviews.title: What
customer_reviews.text: Delicious and plentiful, what else could you want? Also resealable bag, if opened correctly.
customer_reviews.author: Kathryn

customer_reviews.title: Great flavors, my favorites
customer_reviews.text: I have been ordering these monthly and really enjoy them.
customer_reviews.author: Troy Hummon

customer_reviews.title: Yummy
customer_reviews.text: Love love love these and buying in bulk means never running out :)
customer_reviews.author: Chicka

customer_reviews.title: Taste
customer_reviews.text: I loved it, I was concern the the higher quality night affect age of the candy ( being closer to the expiration date) yet this wasnt the case. They tasted just how they should.
customer_reviews.author: Dante A Mejia

customer_reviews.title: Love gummies
customer_reviews.text: the sad part is i killed this so fast haha. Will order again!
customer_reviews.author: Joe M

customer_reviews.title: but the blue and pink ones were my favorite so I figured this was a safe bet
customer_reviews.text: I had never tried this variety, but the blue and pink ones were my favorite so I figured this was a safe bet. They're delicious and fresh feeling/tasting.
customer_reviews.author: Bhujnbfd

customer_reviews.title: Fresh and delicious!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for the candy bar at my daughter's baby shower!
customer_reviews.author: Denise

customer_reviews.title: amazing
customer_reviews.text: its like i want diabetes but its worth it. so good. fresh and fast delivery!
customer_reviews.author: Jay

customer_reviews.title: Loved them!
customer_reviews.text: Used for a candy table at a bridal shower. Huge hit!
customer_reviews.author: Desiree

customer_reviews.text: I had no problems with them being “tough” to chew. Exactly what you’d get at 7/11 but your favorite flavor and 5 lbs!!!
customer_reviews.author: David Dominguez

customer_reviews.title: Worth it To Say The Least
customer_reviews.text: Its 5 pounds for sure lmao, got the bulk pack of very berry crawlers and I'm set for a while now!

customer_reviews.title: Love these gummies!
customer_reviews.text: So tasty! I plan on eating them & also for stocking stuffers in jars... Very small jars 😆😋
customer_reviews.author: Erin

customer_reviews.title: These are OK
customer_reviews.text: The regular flavors are better. Not much variety in this bag.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Trolli!  What's not to like.
customer_reviews.text: Loved the berry flavors. Purchased to share with the girls basketball team and they prefer the regular sour brites.
customer_reviews.author: Pepper

customer_reviews.title: Addictive
customer_reviews.text: I order these more frequently than I care to admit..
customer_reviews.author: Jon

customer_reviews.title: Yum!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for a fishing theme birthday party. These were a hit and sooo yummy!
customer_reviews.author: Sierra

customer_reviews.title: Compelling candy!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Love these so much I have to hide them (from myself)
customer_reviews.author: Gerard J Rauluk

customer_reviews.title: Not quite the same as store brand
customer_reviews.text: These are good and are a pretty good buy for the 5 lb bag but they're not exactly like what you buy in the store these are a little bit more tart
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Taste Great and Fresh
customer_reviews.text: These taste great and are fresh. They are not really very sour.
customer_reviews.author: JAH-Just a Handyman

customer_reviews.title: Would definitely buy gain.
customer_reviews.text: Personally I thought the taste was amazing. The bad is not resealable which is the only thing I would change. The taste is amazing!
customer_reviews.author: Bobbie W.

customer_reviews.title: Yummy!
customer_reviews.text: Am addicted!!! These are great. AND seriously....my nails have gotten longer and stronger the last 6 weeks I've been eating these. Bonus!
customer_reviews.author: Queen Mother

customer_reviews.title: Love the very berry flavor!
customer_reviews.text: Love the vet berry flavor and could not find them at any local stores.
customer_reviews.author: Yvonne

customer_reviews.title: Never liked worms before
customer_reviews.text: Omg I am hooked on these things, I can easily eat a bag a day they are so good.
customer_reviews.author: Shay

customer_reviews.title: Meh
customer_reviews.text: They all kinda tasted the same, and tasted a bit old.
customer_reviews.author: James D.

customer_reviews.title: Loved these! My favorite flavor!
customer_reviews.text: My whole family loved these! They are awesome! Arrived in good condition.
customer_reviews.author: Dave Cochran

customer_reviews.title: Best gummie worms ever!!!
customer_reviews.text: I love these gummie worms. Definitely my fav by far
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: So Happy!
customer_reviews.text: Came in one big bag! I'm giving it to my fiance as a Christmas gift but also to make up for eating all of her Trolli sour sloths.
customer_reviews.author: Grant KL

customer_reviews.title: It's the good stuff
customer_reviews.text: I love to eat these things frozen. Slows you down from eating a handful at a time. Great value
customer_reviews.author: gwill

customer_reviews.title: Yummy
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic these are my favorite and now I can get them in a 5 pound bag!!!!! Ok I’m sold !!!! I will be buying these regularly thanks!! ~Quarantined Customer~
customer_reviews.author: M

customer_reviews.title: Yum!
customer_reviews.text: I am so glad there is a 5# bag of these! I cannot get enough! So addicting!
customer_reviews.author: DSLavoie

customer_reviews.title: Very delicious
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love these, this is my favorite! Just buy it!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome flavor
customer_reviews.text: Tried these instead of the the regular ones. Amazing flavor. Smells great.
customer_reviews.author: Niroshini Naidoo

product_meta.title: Trolli Sour Brite Crawlers Very Berry Gummy Worms, 5 Lb Bulk Candy Bag
product_meta.description: Pattern Name:Candy| Size:80 Ounce (Pack of 1)Trolli candies come in weirdly awesome flavors, weirdly awesome shapes and deliver weirdly awesome fun. These gummies are 100 percent of the daily strange required for teens. Sour and sweet, delicious and demented.
feature_bullets: Trolli Sour Brite Crawlers: Trolli sour gummy worms with a sugar coating pack a punch of tangy sweetness in weirdly awesome berry flavor combos like raspberry blueberry, strawberry blackberry, and blue raspberry berry punch

Sour gummy worms: We think of Sour Brite Crawlers, our classic combo of sugary sweet and lip smacking sour gummy worms in flavors for every taste, as glowing deities that wiggle their way into your snack habit

Trolli bulk candy: Can't get enough of the sweet and sour lip smacking taste of Trolli candy; Buy your favorites in bulk and be ready when the craving hits, or be the hit of party if you can bear to share

Mind blowing flavors: Are very berry gummies or a fruity tropical paradise more your style; How about our Slurpee gummy worms; For the bravest, we have Fruit and Fire Crawlers: sweet, sour, and spicy hot
Weirdly Awesome: We invented the gummi worm in 1986 and have been making the most weirdly awesome gummies ever since, from gummi sloths to Sour Brite Octopus, our sour candy will wow your taste buds

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Currently, item can be shipped only within the U.S. and to APO/FPO addresses. For APO/FPO shipments, please check with the manufacturer regarding warranty and support issues.
specifications.International Shipping: This item is not eligible for international shipping.
